Name: Manhattan (Petite Serve)
Ingredients: 2.5 ml Syrup from Luxardo Maraschino Cherries
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Nick & Nora glass .
Prepare garnish of skewered Luxardo Maraschino Cherry .
History: Recipe created in 2017 by yours truly at the Cabinet Room in London, England. See: Manhattan cocktail history
Nutrition: One serving of Manhattan (Petite Serve) contains 142 calories
